sentences.english: Another checkup reveals that two pieces of woolen serge were misplaced in the case instead of the Venetian cloth.
sentences.chinese: 再次檢查證實兩匹毛嗶嘰錯放在箱子裏當作直貢呢。

sentences.english: He wore a blue serge suit.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着一套藍色嗶嘰西服。

sentences.english: Why don't you get yourself one of those nice serge skirts they're selling at Lord & Taylor's?
sentences.chinese: 你爲什麼不去買一條漂亮的嗶嘰裙子來穿呢？

sentences.english: Serge is a brilliant freelance illustrator from France.
sentences.chinese: 嗶嘰是從法國輝煌的自由職業插畫家。

sentences.english: For men there were sturdy gabardine, shinning silk shirts .
sentences.chinese: 給男人用的有筆挺的嗶嘰，發亮的絲襯衫。

sentences.english: We hope to have your further order for serge at an early date.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望早日收到您的嗶嘰訂單。
